meanings.sent1: After the rain stopped, she decided to resoak her plants to help them grow.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally left my laundry in the washer, so I had to resoak it to get it clean.
meanings.sent3: The sponge was so thirsty, it asked to be resoaked for the third time!
meanings.sent4: The earth eagerly resoaked the rain, quenching its thirst.
meanings.sent5: The chef knew the secret to tender meat was to resoak it in a flavorful marinade.

meanings.sent1: The kids resoaked each other with water guns on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: The spilled drink resoaked the napkin, leaving a wet mark on the table.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully resoaked its fur by jumping into a puddle.
meanings.sent4: Her tears resoaked the letter, blurring the inked words.
meanings.sent5: The storm resoaked the fields, bringing much-needed moisture to the crops.
